title: Five for your planner
text:
Previous Next   
Photo by Deb TuckerToni Visconti, Crys Gallivan, Marianne Chapman and Judith Briod welcome visitors to Boo Fest in   Posted: Tuesday, October 20, 2015 7:00 am | Updated: 5:39 pm, Tue Oct 20, 2015.   
Boo Fest , Friday, Oct. 23, through Saturday, Oct. 31. Downtown   Friday events include Halloween Hogs poker run. Events Saturday, Oct. 24, include a costume contest and children's arts, crafts and games during the day; "Thriller" dance and street party and Vampire Ball Saturday evening. To volunteer, call 304-685-6067 or email pmckowen@shepherd.edu . For complete schedule, go to Shepherdstown.info . 
Mark Brugh , 6 p.m. Friday, Oct. 23, Williamsport Memorial Library, 104 E. Potomac St., Williamsport. Free. Brugh will discuss his book, "Civil War Ghosts of Sharpsburg." Call 301-223-7027.
